overview: Clinker is a single channel experimental video that joins two notions. The first embraces one of the few definitions of the word clinker, which is to play a wrong musical note. Consequently, the audio composition is intentionally fractured and generated with mistakes. Secondly, the video loosely borrows visual inspiration from the Italian poet Lucretiusâ€™ poem The Nature of Things. More specifically, book two entitled The Dance of Atoms. As a result, the joined notions explore a relationship through a lyrical yet abstract synthesis.
title: Clinker
